_comment: SWING TRADER CONFIGURATION - Testing refactored service architecture. Higher consensus, overnight positions, longer intervals.

schedule._trading_interval_comment: Longer interval for swing trading (15 min vs 2 min for day trading)

market_scanner._min_daily_volume_comment: Higher volume requirement for swing trading (500K vs 250K)
market_scanner._max_universe_size_comment: Larger universe to find more opportunities

trading._consensus_comment: Matching blue config threshold for more opportunities
trading._slippage_comment: Max acceptable slippage as percentage (1.0 = 1%). Trades exceeding this will be rejected.

pdt_tracking._comment: Pattern Day Trading protection: threshold is account value above which PDT doesn't apply, limit is max day trades in 5 days

intraday_exit_rules._take_profit_comment: Higher profit target for swing trading (10% vs 6.5%)
intraday_exit_rules._trailing_stop_comment: Wider trailing stop for swing trading (0.75% vs 0.5%)
intraday_exit_rules._breakeven_comment: Higher breakeven threshold for swing trading (2% vs 1.5%)
intraday_exit_rules._end_of_day_comment: DISABLED for swing trading - hold positions overnight

strategies._weights_comment: Same strategies as aggressive but with higher thresholds and longer holding periods

layer1_trade_level._max_risk_comment: Lower risk per trade for swing trading (3% vs 5%) due to overnight exposure
layer1_trade_level._max_position_comment: Smaller positions for swing trading (15% vs 20%) - more diversification
layer1_trade_level._atr_stop_comment: Wider stops for swing trading (2.0x vs 1.5x) - allow for overnight volatility

layer2_portfolio_level._max_total_risk_comment: Lower total risk (20% vs 25%) due to overnight exposure
layer2_portfolio_level._sector_comment: Lower sector concentration (25% vs 30%) - more diversification

layer4_pattern_based._consecutive_losses_comment: Lower tolerance (5 vs 7) for swing trading
layer4_pattern_based._win_rate_comment: Higher required win rate (40% vs 35%) for swing trading

layer5_market_conditions._max_vix_comment: Lower VIX threshold (25 vs 30) for swing trading - avoid high volatility
layer5_market_conditions._volatility_comment: Lower volatility threshold (8% vs 10%) for swing trading

scoring_weights._pl_weight_comment: Higher P&L weight for swing trading (30% vs 20%) - hold winners longer
scoring_weights._momentum_weight_comment: Lower momentum weight (35% vs 45%) - less reactive to short-term moves

position_management._momentum_lookback_comment: Longer lookback for swing trading (10 days vs 5 days)

tax_tracking._comment: Tax obligation tracking for capital gains/losses
tax_tracking._note_short_term: Short-term capital gains tax rate (positions held < 1 year), taxed as ordinary income. Default: 24% (marginal tax bracket)
tax_tracking._note_long_term: Long-term capital gains tax rate (positions held >= 1 year). Default: 15% (most taxpayers), actual rate depends on income: 0%, 15%, or 20%
tax_tracking._note_quarterly: Quarterly tax reports generated automatically on last day of each quarter (Mar 31, Jun 30, Sep 30, Dec 31)
